entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Brochet
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 3:21 PM CST Sunday 25 December 2022

entry.title: Sunday night: Chance of light snow. Low minus 33. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 30 percent chance of light snow early this evening. Clearing this evening. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 33. Wind chill minus 38 this evening and minus 45 overnight. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Sunday 25 December 2022

entry.title: Monday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 28.
entry.summary: Mainly sunny. Increasing cloudiness in the afternoon. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 28. Wind chill minus 45 in the morning and minus 37 in the afternoon. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Sunday 25 December 2022

entry.title: Monday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 30. POP 60%
